title: Persist drift events with model/version + segment context for recalibration workflows

sections.text: When drift is flagged by GOLD-125, store a durable DriftEvent record that captures model name, model version, time window, triggering metrics/thresholds, and affected segments (e.g., ICP tier, industry, region). Include a lightweight data snapshot pointer (query params or dataset ID) so downstream evaluation/retraining jobs can reproduce the exact slice without re-deriving it. Expose the DriftEvent via an internal API for sales ops/engineering to triage and prioritize recalibration work.
